title: 1.Register
content: Voters authenticate using verified IDs or credentials to ensure only eligible users can vote.

title: 2.Cast Vote
content: Users log in securely and cast their vote through an easy and intuitive digital ballot interface.

title: 3.Secure Storage
content: Votes are encrypted and stored securely in the system, ensuring complete anonymity and integrity.

title: 4.Verification
content: The system verifies each ballot and prevents tampering, duplication, or unauthorized access.

title: 5.Counting
content: Votes are counted automatically with high accuracy, eliminating human error or bias.

title: 6.Results
content: Final election results are generated instantly, transparently, and securely for everyone to see.
